UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.
The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Development of chimeric peptides to facilitate the neutralisation of lipopolysaccharides during bactericidal targeting of multidrug-resistant Escherichia coli.
Literature.Author: Wang Z, Liu X, Da Teng, Mao R, Hao Y, Yang N, Wang X, Li Z, Wang J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CVCC 195(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli CVCC 1515(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 533(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 1809(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 10419(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis CVCC 3936(MIC=8µg/ml),Streptococcus suis CVCC 606(MIC=32µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=16µg/ml),Listeria ivanovii ATCC 19119(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2411(MIC=>64µg/ml)
